text: @cspan @Jim_Jordan As the White House attacks Dr. Fauci, in order to truly appreciate how truly abysmally awful our national coronavirus response under Trump has been, you need to look at the bigger picture. My deep-dive coverage here: https://t.co/zEJyEo69Pv
